title: NOW LEASING – Beautiful 2 Bedroom Apartment Home Available
posting_body: > Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!
If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.
Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.
Additional availability outside our community's normal office hours is available BY APPOINTMENT ONLY.
Please contact our on-site management & leasing team at any time via phone or email at any time for additional information.
Riverstation Apartments, conveniently located in Dallas, offers incredible - yet affordable – two, three & four bedroom apartment homes!
Our community is near all sorts of dining, shopping, and many other additional entertainment locations.
Our homes all include spacious floorplans that you will absolutely love.
In addition, our apartments also feature energy efficient kitchen appliances, an additional storage area, roomy closets, ceiling fans AND a private patio or balcony space.
Community amenities include but are not limited to, a beautiful community clubhouse, planned resident activities, refreshing outdoor swimming pool, on-site laundry facility & a lot more.
Riverstation is LEASING NOW - Give us a call to schedule a personal tour and for more information on pricing and community details.
- Planned Resident Activities by Portfolio Resident Services
*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.
Riverstation Apartments participates in an affordable housing program.

Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $42,000 | 2 Occupants: $48,000 | 3 Occupants: $54,000 | 4 Occupants: $60,000 | 5 Occupants: $64,800 | 6 Occupants: $69,600 | 7 Occupants: $74,400 | 8 Occupants: $79,200.
To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.
Make the move today by giving our professional staff a call:
